text: 7.3-5 Mat 13.55, Mak 3.21, Apo 1.14 Gaknɨŋ, Jisas nɨmam sɨkop, kɨli nop abe gos ma lɨnɨgɨlak tek, apɨl agɨlak, Nad man awl kelɨgɨl Judiya amnoŋ agɨlak. Amɨl, bɨ nad tap mageptek gɨpan tek ge nɨgɨnɨgabal agɨlak. Bɨ olap ne bɨawl mɨdɨnɨg gɨnɨgab ak, tap ne okok we gɨl ma gɨnɨgab agɨlak. Mɨseŋ yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agɨlak. Anɨb ak nad tap mageptek ogɨnap gɨnɨgayn agɨl, mɨseŋ sɨŋak gɨnɨmɨn binɨb mɨdupsek nɨgɨnɨgel agɨlak.
